newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Ireland's C.Bank 1996 profit falls 77.9 mln pounds.
newsitem.headline: Ireland's C.Bank 1996 profit falls 77.9 mln pounds.

text.p: Ireland's Central Bank said on Tuesday that profit for the year ended December 31 1996 fell 77.9 million Irish pounds to 120.2 million.
The bank said in its 1996 annual report that the 1995 profit was "exceptionally high" due to large gains on marketable securities.
It said net income before operating costs was 143.3 million versus 220.4 the previous year.
The surplus payable to the exchequer was 103.0 million pounds against 176.3 in 1995.
